ModMetaData.name: Multiplayer Compatibility

ModMetaData.description: Miscellaneous patches to make Multiplayer work Mod Support: - Alpha Animals - Animals Logic - Genetic Rim - Path Avoid - Power Switch - Simple Sidearms - Stuffed Floors - Time of day Switch - Vanilla Fishing Expanded - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Farming - Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Power
